mapper.sql: id, matcher_id, total_sale_amount, total_profit, unsettle_profit, product_commission, product_unsettle_commission, product_settle_commission, product_settle_amount, product_unsettle_amount, invite_commission, invite_unsettle_amount, invite_settle_amount, invite_unsettle_commission, invite_settle_commission, fan_count, invite_count, update_date, update_time, create_date, create_time,member_id
mapper.select:
SELECT T.ICON,T.NICK_NAME,T.`NAME`,T.PHONE,T.`LEVEL`,T2.`NAME` AS INVITE_NAME,T2.ICON AS INVITE_ICON,T2.NICK_NAME AS INVITE_NICK_NAME, T3.TOTAL_SALE_AMOUNT, T3.TOTAL_PROFIT,T3.UNSETTLE_PROFIT,T3.PRODUCT_COMMISSION,T3.INVITE_COMMISSION,T3.FAN_COUNT,T3.INVITE_COUNT,T3.PRODUCT_UNSETTLE_COMMISSION, T3.PRODUCT_SETTLE_COMMISSION,T3.PRODUCT_SETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.PRODUCT_UNSETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.INVITE_UNSETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.INVITE_SETTLE_AMOUNT, T3.INVITE_UNSETTLE_COMMISSION,T3.INVITE_SETTLE_COMMISSION,T.ID AS MATCHER_ID,T1.wechat_no as wechatNo LEFT JOIN SYS_USER T2 ON T2.PHONE = T1.INVITE_PHONE LEFT JOIN SYS_MATCHER_STATISTICS T3 ON T3.MATCHER_ID = T.ID
AND T.LEVEL = #{matcherStatics.level}
AND (T2.NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matcherStatics.inviteName},'%') OR T2.NAME LIKE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matcherStatics.inviteName},'%'))
AND T.PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matcherStatics.phone},'%')
AND (T.NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matcherStatics.name},'%') OR T.NAME LIKE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{matcherStatics.name},'%'))
SELECT COUNT(1) AS FAN_COUNT FROM UMS_MEMBER T WHERE T.MATCH_USER_ID = #{matcherUserId}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS INVITE_COUNT FROM UMS_APPLY_MATCHER T WHERE T.INVITE_PHONE = #{invitePhone} AND T.AUDIT_STATUS = '1'

SELECT T.ICON,T.NICK_NAME,T.`NAME`,T.PHONE,T.`LEVEL`,T2.`NAME` AS INVITE_NAME,T2.ICON AS INVITE_ICON,T2.NICK_NAME AS INVITE_NICK_NAME, T3.TOTAL_SALE_AMOUNT, T3.TOTAL_PROFIT,T3.UNSETTLE_PROFIT,T3.PRODUCT_COMMISSION,T3.INVITE_COMMISSION,T3.FAN_COUNT,T3.INVITE_COUNT,T3.PRODUCT_UNSETTLE_COMMISSION, T3.PRODUCT_SETTLE_COMMISSION,T3.PRODUCT_SETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.PRODUCT_UNSETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.INVITE_UNSETTLE_AMOUNT,T3.INVITE_SETTLE_AMOUNT, T3.INVITE_UNSETTLE_COMMISSION,T3.INVITE_SETTLE_COMMISSION,T.ID AS MATCHER_ID FROM SYS_USER T LEFT JOIN UMS_APPLY_MATCHER T1 ON T.PHONE = T1.PHONE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER T2 ON T2.PHONE = T1.INVITE_PHONE LEFT JOIN SYS_MATCHER_STATISTICS T3 ON T3.MATCHER_ID = T.ID WHERE T.ID = #{matcherUserId}
